title: Brand new large 3 bedroom apartment for sale
details:
Development under construction

Expected completion last quarter of 2018

Large 3 bedroom apartment - 2500 sq ft

Open plan living with large balcony with seperate wet kitchen and dry pantry equipped with all white goods and air conditoners to all living areas

Seperate maid's room and bathroom with seperate access

1 allocated car parking and on site gym on rooftop

Situated in the heart of Nawala

Expected sale price - Rs 50 million (negotiable)

Serious offers only
